SEARCH
Module com.example.eventmanagementdemo
Package com.example.eventmanagementdemo.dao.event

Interface IEventDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventDAOImpl, EventDAOImplTesting
public interface IEventDAO
Interface for the Event Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Event class with the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEvent(Event event)
    Add a new Event to the database.
    void
    deleteEvent(Event event)
    Delete the event whose id was provided.
    Event
    getEvent(int id)
    Retrieve the event based on the id.
    List<Event>
    getEvents()
    Retrieve all the event from the database.
    List<Event>
    getUpcomingEvents()
    Retrieve all the upcoming event from the database.
    void
    updateEvent(Event event)
    Update the event based on the id provided in the event.

  • Method Details

    • addEvent

      void addEvent(Event event)
      Add a new Event to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - : The event to be added.

    • getEvents

      List<Event> getEvents()
      Retrieve all the event from the database.
      Returns:
      All the events from the database.

    • getUpcomingEvents

      List<Event> getUpcomingEvents()
      Retrieve all the upcoming event from the database.
      Returns:
      All the upcoming events from the database.

    • getEvent

      Event getEvent(int id)
      Retrieve the event based on the id.
      Parameters:
      id - : Id of the event to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Event that was requested.

    • deleteEvent

      void deleteEvent(Event event)
      Delete the event whose id was provided.
      Parameters:
      event - : the event to be deleted.

    • updateEvent

      Parameters:
